sentence.Network_en: I had a ringside seat for the whole performance.

sentence.Network_en: Most of the top British trainers were at the ringside.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国最顶尖的教练大都坐在台边区。

sentence.Network_en: According to law, a doctor must be present at the ringside.
sentence.Network_cn: 按法律规定，场边必须有一名医生。

entry.tran: (马戏台、拳击台或超越障碍比赛场地的)台边区，场边
entry.def: The ringside is the area around the edge of a circus ring, boxing ring, or show jumping ring.

example.ex: Most of the top British trainers were at the ringside.
example.tran: 英国最顶尖的教练大都坐在台边区。

entry.tran: （座位或视角）台边上的，台边前排的
entry.def: If you have a ringside seat or a ringside view, you are close to an event and can see it clearly.

example.ex: I had a ringside seat for the whole performance.
example.tran: 整场表演我都坐在场边前排座位上。

means.word_mean: 1. first row of seating; has an unobstructed view of a boxing or wrestling ring
